++ Links Websites
Contents:	[:toc:]
[:rel:back]
----

+++ General
You can add links to websites to your page and open them in your browser. You do this with a default web URL.


    * http://groups.google.com/group/wikidpad/web/home
    * http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/wikidPad/
    * http://wikidpad.python-hosting.com/
    * http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WikidPad

[:rel:top]
----
+++ Link titles
++++ Text
A link text can in preview and export be replaced by a link title, that then serves as a clickable synonym for the link.

    * [http://groups.google.com/group/wikidpad/web/home | Wikidpad: Home page]
    * [http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/wikidPad/ | Wikidpad: Yahoo user group]
    * [http://wikidpad.python-hosting.com/ | Wikidpad: Trac home page]
    * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WikidPad | Wikidpad: On Wikipedia]

    ----
++++ Images
Instead of a text, also an image can be used as a "title" or synonym for a link.

    * Wikidpad: Home page [http://groups.google.com/group/wikidpad/web/home |  rel://files/google35.gif>am]
    * Wikidpad: Yahoo user group [http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/wikidPad/ | rel://files/yahoo25.png>am] 
    * Wikidpad: Trac home page [http://wikidpad.python-hosting.com/ |  rel://files/trac25.png>am]
    * Wikidpad: On Wikipedia [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WikidPad | rel://files/wikipedia_logo.png>am]

The images can be formatted with the default image attributes; see [TextImages|Textformatting: images].
